item.title: Need Help Please Read
item.dc:creator: @mich702703 mich702703
item.description:
@mich702703 wrote:

my donator system is different…il explain:

in the config map iv added donators.txt (u need that to give players donator rights)
and in my player accounts iv added donator = 0.

then in client.java iv just added some shit for donators (if donator=1)(remember donators must my in donators.txt) and then u have the donator rights

item.title: Need Help Please Read
item.dc:creator: @wonderspring wonderspring
item.description:
@wonderspring wrote:

I think its server side… so i’ve done this tutorial : http://www.google.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/203019-non-adding-new-crowns-through-cache.html
(delete the google from link and type rune-server)

and now i whant to add coder crown i did the same thing from that tutorial but when i add this code :
if (playerRights == 4) {
out.write(4); //Crown fixup
} else {
out.write(playerRights); // mod level
}

ok i was thinking its hidden … no problem i did that tutorial againd and add the code:
if (playerRights == 5) {
out.write(5); //Crown fixup
} else {
out.write(playerRights); // mod level
}

But its useless when i try to log in game is disconnecting me… when i remove the second code (the one with == 4 or == 5) every thing works…

Any suggestion? Please reply.

Read full topic
